name: Stigfinnare
detailed_description:
Early-Access-Purchase reward

Early-Access-Purchase will give you exclusive visual content for customizing charscters.


About the Game

Learn to improvise during a fight with an opponent in Stigfinnare. Players on 5 different maps with their tasks and features.


You will always get a new experience playing this game because everything is random here.


Defense a hill with a hair dryer on KOTH map, create your own minefield at Trapdoor map, get into enemy bases and steal resources at Electrize map.


Fight in a team or split to get the points needed to change your character.


You can play with your friends in private lobbies.


In this game you will find:
Battle for energy at map "Electrize"
Detecting of enemy positions at map "Destruction"
Making decisions - go ahead to reach the finish line first, or turn and try luck on the "Maze" map
Creating strategies with set traps on the "Trapdoor" map
Epic battles with a hairdryer and blowing off enemies from platforms on the "KOTH" map
All this you can do in a network game.
Customers will get fun for many hours.

short_description: Your goal in stigfinnare is gain most experience in round and take first place in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 800 or MSI AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: This game supports only 16:9 resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x86
  • Processor: Intel core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: If you have troubles with FPS you can enable Awful mode or Adaptive mode in settings

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: In this game there is a small amount of blood, firearms and edged weapons, murders without naturalistic scenes.  Blood is displayed when bullets from a weapon hit the body of other players.  The game is not recommended for persons under 16 years
